definitions.example: I've been here for two days and a bit.

definitions.definition: A period from midnight to the following midnight.
Rotational period of a planet (especially Earth).
definitions.example: A day on Mars is slightly over 24 hours.

definitions.definition: The part of a day period which one spends at one’s job, school, etc.
definitions.example: I worked two days last week.

definitions.definition: Part of a day period between sunrise and sunset where one enjoys daylight; daytime.
definitions.example: day and night;  I work at night and sleep during the day.

definitions.definition: A specified time or period; time, considered with reference to the existence or prominence of a person or thing; age; time.
A period of contention of a day or less.
definitions.example: The day belonged to the Allies.

definitions.definition: A 24-hour period beginning at 6am or sunrise.
definitions.example: Your 8am forecast: The high for the day will be 30 and the low, before dawn, will be 10.

definitions.definition: To spend a day (in a place).
